name: The helpful Elf
description:
Game made by Psycho_666 (aka Pete) as an entry for the Extra Credits Holiday Game Jam 2018.

The general idea was to make a small rhythm game about elfs saving presents and package material from the Grinch and his buddies in different time periods and sending them back to present times. There was an idea to make a tiny minigame of packaging the presents to make them more presentable. That quickly went out the window.

The final result is what I could code in 3 days - a small rhythm game about presents gathering and grinch punishing. It's functional, but extremely unpolished.

Enjoy and happy holidays...
